li.a: Eagles’ Nest Before and After School Care

div.class: post-3961 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news-announcements category-parents

p.strong: An April 3, 2020 message from Dr. Smith, ATA principal:

p.em: I hope everyone is staying safe and practicing “Social Distancing”. As you all know, this week Governor Ducey issued school closures for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Therefore ATA will continue with online learning through May 21, 2020. Our awesome teachers here at Adams are working very hard preparing work and learning about new software systems to academically support our students and families. As we adapt to our new normal for educating students, I am asking for your patience and positive thoughts as we navigate our way through this unfortunate time in our society.

Teachers will be available online, using Microsoft Office Teams to teach and review work with students from 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Teachers will communicate with parents and students by way of newsletters and/or email, for “one on one” questions and concerns regarding student work.

At this time, we are in the process of preparing a schedule for families to retrieve student belongings from school. Once the schedule is completed, we will communicate this information to all families.

On behalf of the Main Office, I would like to thank each and every one: teachers, students, parents and other stakeholders affiliated with Adams Traditional Academy, for your understanding and patience during this uncertain time.

div.p:
School Hours:
Full Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 3:15 pm
Half Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 11:15 am
Grades 1-8 8:00 am – 3:15 pm

Early Release Schedule:
AM Preschool 8:15 am – 9:45 am
PM Preschool 10:30 am – 12:00 pm
Full Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 12:00 pm
Half Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 10:00 am
Grades 1-8 8:00 am – 12:00 pm
